experience: You and Tim both know Scott Kelly, Tommy Schaeffer, and 27 others

I am also fully capable of performing labor in any of these areas and others such as video, broadcasting, and film including Sci-Fi’s, horrors, dramas, comedies, meetings, commercials, studios, chroma screens and others. I have provided a crew of 16 other freelancers for a concert, 11 for an event and 8 for a corporate event. All are very professional and get the job done the first time.I am multi-talented in staging area and have work in each of these fields. Lighting, audio, and video technician; Program a Leprecon LP624 or LP612 light board, carpenter, rigger (ballroom & theatre), projectionist, video switcher, spotlight, camera operator (long lens CCU), cable grip, breakout manager, fly man op, led wall building, lasers set up, electrician, technical director, production assistant, supervisor, assistant stage manager, audio mixing for meetings, un/load trucks, push cases and other areas as well. Getting better at Power Point.  Although my specialty is lighting and video, I have used scissor lifts, man lifts, forklifts boom forklifts and boom man lifts. I have experience in working on well over a 1,000 plus shows.I am multi-talented in production as a driver, grip, key grip, dolly grip, jib operator, PA, rigger, lighting tech, best boy, gaffer, electrician, carpenter, studio technician and others. I have access to 2 rental grip trucks full of gear. I have also done acting as an extra/actor and voice-overs. I have done 39 national and local movies and commercials. I recently finished work on a full feature movie called “Cathedral City.”
Shari's Pamper Pets and House Sitting

Pet SitterShari's Pamper Pets and House Sitting (480) 291-2776shari-n-tim at cox dot net1998 – Present ArizonaShari and Tim stay at clients home to help reduce the stress of the owner and the pet while the ower is away.From a day to a month. Some of our clients are CEO's, actors, race care drivers, airline pilots, military and musicians. From houses that are mansions, guest homes to ranches. Shari and Tim take care of, walk, clean up after and feed the pets. Clean the house on our last day of stay. We have received comments that the house is so clean, like we were never there. Shari is a certified Vet Tech. for over 20 years. Some of the pets we take care of are dogs, cats, horses, reptiles, birds, fish of all kinds. She has been house sitting for over 15 years. References upon request. Rates are reasonable compare to other companies. If you like what you see, and are living in Arizona call Shari at 480-291-2776 Leave a voice message.

(480) 636-6492 Cell/textI can help you out, while at the same time you can help me out.Can use some extra gas money.$5.00 minimum for first five miles.10 cents for every 1/10 of a mile or $1.00 for each additional mile. For the surrounding Phoenix, AZ. areas.Based in Apache Junction, AZ.Rules are:Cash Only. I will have no change on me. (You must have the correct change on you.)You must be 18 years old to ride with me.Only 1 person can ride with me.You call Tim up at 480-636-6492 and tell him you need a ride.If I don’t answer right away please leave a voice message.If I do or don't answer leave your name and number on how I can get a hold of you.Major cross streets and address on where to be picked up and designation on where you are going.I will call you with in five minutes. If no call response then it may mean that I am on a job with a client.I prefer appointments but can do last minute pick-ups too.My word is my honor. If I say I will be there. Then I will be there.If for some reason I can’t. Well I apologize in advance.I will tell you if I can give you a ride.If for some reason I break down then I will call you.I don’t do this full time for a living. Just something to help me out.Due to safety factor I reserve the right to refuse service to any passenger. Also if it is bad weather then I am close for the day. Due to safety.Procedures:I come to your address. You hand me five dollars in cash.A small back pack or small bag that you carry is ok.We both get on the bike and I zero out my Odometer.You must provide eye protection for you whether it be sun glasses, goggles, safety glasses.No exceptions on this rule. It is the law.Sometimes I have goggles on me, but don’t count on it.It is your choice to wear a helmet or not. If so you provide it.I do not have or do I provide one for you to wear.Tell me if you have ever ridden a motorcycle before. If not I will educate you on this.You tell me the directions on where you need to go.

We control traffic at intersections and roadways and highways. Uniform with utility belt and carry a side arm for our protection. Dress uniform for military escorts.

summary: I am a clean-cut freelance technician who performs labor and services for set ups, tear downs, and shows and shoots. Though I do not have any gear for productions, I do have my own tools, which I use, at the production site. I am very good in my profession and my clients and other fellow technicians know me as one of the best in Arizona. I am currently seeking new clients and booking for up-coming productions and would like to be considered for any productions you may be scheduling. I have been in the staging industry since 1995. Working still to this day Rock & Roll to Corporate shows.In 2003, after working WWE events, I expanded my services to include the film, video, commercial and broadcasting industries. In 2005, I became a freelance technician and have covered every facet of the industry from movies to commercials, meetings, scenic, trade shows, A/V production, and live and taped venues.In 2006 became a LLC as Right Stuff Productions in AZ.I am very reliable and once I am confirmed for a job, I will be there early. Pay is negotiable for each job. I take great pride in all jobs I perform and there is no show or shoot too small or too big. I am always a great asset to your production. I am one that will finish the job go to the lead and ask what is the next job. You will not have to look for me.I have traveled several times and willing to do tours. You provide sleeping arrangements. I have a passport book and clean criminal record. I have driven carrying production equipment in 24’ box trucks and under. I have in the past back up semi trailers to the dock. Great with mirrors and spotter. Clean driving record for past 10 years. 1 speeding ticket in 2011 went to traffic school.I would appreciate it if you would look over my information and forward my services to other businesses you feel may want to use my services.Thank you for your time and I look forward to working with you soon.Experience below Freelance Tech. / Crewman.
name: Tim Mortimer
